name: HomeworkBuddy
0: ”Alexa, tell homework buddy that i finished my homework”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: homework buddy
des: Homework Buddy is there to congratulate you when you finish your homework! Say 'Tell Homework Buddy that I finished my homework' and he'll congratulate you!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
